entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0183.10178] The value 10,800,000 for us-gaap:DeferredFinanceCostsNet has been broken down using the axis StatementOfFinancialPositionLocationActivityCapitalizationAxis and the member us-gaap:OtherNoncurrentAssetsMember. This concept is an instant concept. This axis should only be used with a duration concept. See FASB guidance at https://xbrl.fasb.org/impguidance/FSL_PG/finstatelocdimensions.pdf.
The properties of this us-gaap:DeferredFinanceCostsNet fact are: Period :2024-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementOfFinancialPositionLocationActivityCapitalizationAxis=us-gaap:OtherNoncurrentAssetsMember, us-gaap:CreditFacilityAxis=us-gaap:RevolvingCreditFacilityMember
